mosinstall.name: Random Image
mosinstall.author: Mambo Project
mosinstall.description: This module display a random image from your chosen directory

param.name: type
param.label: Image Type
param.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (default is PNG)

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: URL to redirect to if image is clicked on

param.name: width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: Image width (all images will be displayed with this width)

param.name: height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: Image height (all images will be displayed with the height)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
